doc.after: The recording named Buena Vista Social Club after the Havana institution became an international success and the ensemble was encouraged to perform with a full line up in Amsterdam in 1998 German director Wim Wenders captured the performance on film followed by a second concert in Carnegie Hall New York City for a documentary that included interviews with the musicians conducted in Havana Wenders film also called Buena Vista Social Club was released to critical acclaim receiving an Academy Award nomination for Best Documentary feature and winning numerous accolades including Best Documentary at the European Film Awards
